description: The National Institute of Technology Agartala and the Indian Institute of Information Technology Agartala will celebrate the 77th Independence Day. A March Past by the students is one of the main events to honor the day.

march_past_practice.participants: All undergraduate (UG) students, boys and girls, of NIT Agartala and IIIT Agartala
march_past_practice.instructions: All Gymkhana members should coordinate the students. Students are directed to attend the practice sessions sincerely.

copy_to: P.S. to the Director, NIT Agartala, for kind information of the Director
P.S. to the Director, IIIT Agartala, for kind information of the Director
The Registrar, NIT Agartala, for kind information
All Wardens for information and necessary action
Physical Education Officer for information and necessary action
Sports Officer for information and necessary action
SAS Officer for information and necessary action
System Administrator with a request to upload the notice on the Institute Website
